trans-unit.source: Defines a segment of time that may contain child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un intervallo di tempo che può contenere figlio <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: These child timelines become active according to their respective <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Queste sequenze temporali figlio diventano attive in base alle rispettive <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.source: Also, child timelines are able to overlap (run in parallel) with each other.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, le sequenze temporali figlio sono in grado di sovrapporsi tra loro (esecuzione in parallelo).

trans-unit.source: ParallelTimeline objects can be children (nested inside) of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti di ParallelTimeline possono essere figli (annidati all'interno) di un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: This can provide better encapsulation of timing sequences in complex animations.
trans-unit.target: Ciò può fornire una migliore incapsulamento delle sequenze temporali di animazioni complesse.

trans-unit.source: ParallelTimeline has its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> property therefore all child timeline <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> values are relative to the parent ParallelTimeline value for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ParallelTimeline ha il proprio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>proprietà tutti figlio della sequenza temporale pertanto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>i valori sono ParallelTimeline valore padre di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe con specificata <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <> </> *>, <> </> *> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref>, eseguendo copie complete dei valori dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Durante la copia delle proprietà di dipendenza, questo metodo copia delle associazioni dati e dei riferimenti di risorsa (), ma non possono risolvere non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> era di proprietà<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref> oggetto, eseguendo copie complete dei valori correnti di tale oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti alle risorse, data binding e le animazioni non vengono copiate, ma i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of this <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo esegue l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Return the natural duration (duration of a single iteration) from a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la durata naturale (durata di una singola iterazione) da un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A natural duration is the period of a single iteration.
trans-unit.target: Una durata naturale è il periodo di una singola iterazione.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> it means that the natural duration is unknown.
trans-unit.target: Se questo metodo restituisce <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>significa che la durata naturale è sconosciuta.</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> is determined by the author.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A>del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>è determinata dall'autore.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the duration of streaming media would be determined by the provider of the streaming media.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, potrebbe determinare la durata dei flussi multimediali dal provider di flussi multimediali.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> to return the natural duration from.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> per la durata naturale da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref> quantity representing the natural duration.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"> </xref> quantità che rappresenta la durata naturale.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> children slips.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che specifica il comportamento di questa sequenza temporale quando uno o più dei relativi <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref> figlio slittano.

trans-unit.source: It is often desirable to synchronize animations and media.
trans-unit.target: Spesso è consigliabile sincronizzare le animazioni e supporti.

trans-unit.source: However, this is complicated by the fact that media playback can be delayed by loading or buffering making it difficult to reliably play an animation along with media.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, questo è complicato dal fatto che la riproduzione dei supporti può essere posticipato da durante il caricamento o il buffer difficili da riprodurre in modo affidabile un'animazione con supporto.

trans-unit.source: The SlipBehavior property is used to determine what happens when media and animations are played together.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà SlipBehavior viene utilizzata per determinare cosa accade quando il supporto e le animazioni vengono riprodotte insieme.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> (default) specifies that animation timelines do not need to be synced and will play when specified regardless of the state of other media in the timeline.
trans-unit.target: Il valore <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>(impostazione predefinita) specifica che sequenze temporali delle animazioni non devono essere sincronizzate e verranno riprodotte quando specificato, indipendentemente dallo stato degli altri supporti nella sequenza temporale.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> on the other hand, specifies that an animation will wait (slip) until media is ready to play.
trans-unit.target: Il valore <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>d'altra parte, specifica che un'animazione attenderà (trasporto) fino a quando non è pronto per la riproduzione multimediale.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: The diagrams below illustrate this behavior.
trans-unit.target: I diagrammi seguenti illustrano questo comportamento.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> plays a video and an animation.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>riproduce un video e un'animazione.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: When SlipBehavior is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> grows to play all media and animations.
trans-unit.target: Quando SlipBehavior è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>aumenta per riprodurre tutti i supporti e le animazioni.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram") ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds which gives media and animations 5 seconds to play regardless of how much they slip.
trans-unit.target: ![Diagramma: Legenda del diagramma SlipBehavior](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "diagramma: chiave del diagramma SlipBehavior")![diagramma: valore della proprietà SlipBehavior di Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "diagramma: SlipBehavior valore Grow della proprietà") questo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>ha un SlipBehavior di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>e un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>di 5 secondi, che fornisce supporto e le animazioni 5 secondi a indipendentemente da quanto che rallentano.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: ![Diagramma: Valore Grow proprietà SlipBehavior della](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "diagramma: valore della proprietà SlipBehavior di Grow") questo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>è un SlipBehavior <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> (and any other non-media children of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) does not progress unless the media timeline is also progressing.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>(e tutti gli altri figli di non supporti il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) avanza a meno che la sequenza temporale dei supporti anche si avvicina.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>

trans-unit.source: If the media takes a while to load, or if it is buffering, the animation will wait (slips) with it.
trans-unit.target: Se il supporto richiede un certo tempo per caricare o se viene memorizzato nel buffer, l'animazione di attesa (trasporto) con esso.

trans-unit.source: This allows animations to synchronize with a single media file.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo le animazioni per la sincronizzazione con un singolo file multimediale.

trans-unit.source: ![SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: ![Diagramma SlipBehavior per contenuto multimediale e animazione](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "Diagramma SlipBehavior per contenuto multimediale e animazione") questo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>ha un SlipBehavior di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>di 5 secondi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the media file and animation are guaranteed to play for 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: In questo scenario, il file multimediale e animazione sono garantiti per la riproduzione per 5 secondi.

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![Diagramma: Proprietà SlipBehavior di Storyboard](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "diagramma: proprietà SlipBehavior di Storyboard") # # informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> children slips.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica il comportamento di questa sequenza temporale quando uno o più dei relativi <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref> figlio slittano.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore per il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
